title: Exploration of the pharmacological components and therapeutic mechanisms in treatment of Alzheimer's disease with Polygonati Rhizoma and its processed product using combined analysis of metabolomics, network pharmacology, and gut microbiota
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Liao Xiaojuan, Liu Hongmei, Wang Zhuxin, Liu Xiaoqin, Deng Lanbing, Luo Dan, Zhou Yi
